esg.saml.attr.service.api
Interface SAMLAttributeStatementHandler

public interface SAMLAttributeStatementHandler

Internal API for processing SAML attribute statements. This API contains both server (building) and client (parsing) side functionality.

Method Summary
 org.opensaml.saml2.core.Assertion buildAttributeStatement(SAMLAttributes samlAttributes, List<org.opensaml.saml2.core.Attribute> requestedAttributes)
          Method to build a SAML Attribute Statement assertion for a given user.
 SAMLAttributes parseAttributeStatement(org.opensaml.saml2.core.Assertion assertion)
          Method to extract the user attributes from a SAML Attribute Statement assertion.
 

Method Detail

buildAttributeStatement

org.opensaml.saml2.core.Assertion buildAttributeStatement(SAMLAttributes samlAttributes,
                                                          List<org.opensaml.saml2.core.Attribute> requestedAttributes)
Method to build a SAML Attribute Statement assertion for a given user.

Parameters:
samlAttributes - : object containing the user attributes.
requestedAttributes - : list of SAML attributes included in the SAML request.
Returns:
: SAML attribute statement assertion about the given user.

parseAttributeStatement

SAMLAttributes parseAttributeStatement(org.opensaml.saml2.core.Assertion assertion)
Method to extract the user attributes from a SAML Attribute Statement assertion.

Parameters:
assertion - : the SAML assertion containing the attribute statement about the user.
Returns:
: an object populated with attributes.
